channel.title: Help with making server
channel.description: okm my server is insidiax and i went to client . java replaced SERVER= 127.0.0.1 with my no-ip still dosent let me play yes i have portforworded abd yes i enterd the name in right please help

item.title: Help with making server

item.description:

ok but my server dosent work error conecting to server

Read full topic

item.title: Help with making server
item.dc:creator: @Medi Medi
item.description:
@Medi wrote:

You keep the IP 127.0.0.1, but only if you’re connecting. If for instance you wanted someone else to join your server you would then change it to your NO-IP, compile it then send them the client. However with insidiaX you need to make sure the cache is in your C:/ drive or change the signlink.java (Located in the sign folder) file so that it reads the cahce from your desired location. If you don’t understand this. Please feel free to PM me and i will try to help you more.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with making server
item.dc:creator: @CoreVersion CoreVersion
item.description:
@CoreVersion wrote:

Thats because you don’t put your no-ip there.

Your no-ip isn’t for you atall, thats for everyone ELSE to connect with.

Go start >> run >> cmd >> then type “ipconfig”

Look for your IPv4 adress, and use that for YOURSELF, and …make sure the server is running :L

Read full topic
